abstract: Bank of America reported profit of $2 billion compared with $3.2 billion last year, as the nation’s biggest bank continued to battle the legacies of the mortgage crisis.
snippet: Bank of America reported profit of $2 billion compared with $3.2 billion last year, as the nation’s biggest bank continued to battle the legacies of the mortgage crisis.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America reported a 37 percent drop in first-quarter earnings on Friday, as the nation’s biggest bank continued to battle the legacy of the mortgage crisis and legal problems linked to the ill-fated acquisition of Countrywide Financial.

abstract: Reports on consumer prices and factory production offset disappointing results from Google and Bank of America.
snippet: Reports on consumer prices and factory production offset disappointing results from Google and Bank of America.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose on Friday as higher-than-estimated data on consumer confidence and manufacturing bolstered optimism about the economy.

abstract: The shuffle at Bank of America shows that at some big banks, executives don’t stay chief financial officer for very long.
snippet: The shuffle at Bank of America shows that at some big banks, executives don’t stay chief financial officer for very long.
lead_paragraph: At some of the biggest banks, there has been a revolving door to the office of chief financial officer.

headline.main: Where Have All the Bank C.F.O.’s Gone?
